      • getServiceName

        public java.lang.String getServiceName()
        Description copied from interface: Service
        Retrieves a unique string identifying this service. May also be used during parsing.

        Note that this identifier must conform to an ENUM convention: upper case only, underscore for space.

        A service MUST not alter its identifier once it has been registered.

        Specified by:
        getServiceName in interface Service
        Returns:
        A unique reward ID.

      • hasPlayerHistory

        public java.lang.Boolean hasPlayerHistory(org.bukkit.Location blockLocation)
                                   throws HistoryException
        Description copied from interface: HistoryService
        Determines whether or not a block has been placed by a player.

        A service should return NULL if it cannot decide on a value, OR report that its return values always probabilistic (using HistoryService.hasFalsePositives() or HistoryService.hasFalseNegatives()).

        Specified by:
        hasPlayerHistory in interface HistoryService
        Parameters:
        blockLocation - - location of the block in question.
        Returns:
        TRUE if the given block was placed by a player, FALSE if it was placed naturally, NULL if uknown.
        Throws:
        HistoryException

      • hasFalsePositives

        public boolean hasFalsePositives()
        Description copied from interface: HistoryService
        Whether or not this service may return false positives.

        If it does, HistoryProviders may decide to inquire other services, if at all possible.

        Specified by:
        hasFalsePositives in interface HistoryService
        Returns:
        TRUE if this service returns false positives, FALSE otherwise.
